title: The Fianchetto
description: As white, start the game with 1. g3 .. 2. Bg2

title: The forbidden tactic
description: Start a game as white with 1. e4 .. 2. Bc4 .. 3. Qf3 or Qh5.

title: The English
description: As white, start the game with 1. c4

title: Sicillian defence
description: As black, play 1. e4 c5

title: All pawns no hope
description: As black, play 1. e4 c6. (Caro Kann)

title: King`s indian defence
description: As black, play 1.d4 Nf6 2. .. g6.

title: Dutch defence
description: As black, play 1. d4 f5

title: Castle early and often
description: Castle at the first move when it is possible

title: The emperors new clothes
description: Move the king five moves in a row

title: Bish don`t kill my vibe
description: Trade both your knights for the enemy bishops.

title: Knife F5
description: Play Nf5

title: The mad king
description: Capture 3 pawns or pieces with the king.

title: No horsing around
description: Promote a pawn to a knight.

title: Shish kebab
description: Pin a knight to a queen or king with a rook.

title: Ahead of schedule
description: End a game with at least 3 minutes left on the clock.

title: Proper etiquette
description: Shake hands with the opponents and put your wristwatch at the side of the board.

title: Super-computer moves
description: Push an a- or h-pawn like AlphaZero (a4..a5, h4..h5, a5..a4, h5..h4)

title: Un croissant
description: Play en passant.

title: Do you like pi√±a coladas?
description: Put the queen and king next to eachother while none of them are on their home squares.

title: Check yourself b4 you wreck yourself!
description: Check the enemy king by putting a piece on b4.

title: Special bomb squad
description: Capture an enemy piece or pawn on c4.

title: Queen`s gambit antagonist
description: Offer a draw and if declined, resign the game

title: I`m just happy to be here
description: Win a game leaving at least one piece unmoved for the entire game.

title: Touchdown
description: Move your king to the opposite side of the board

title: Night night
description: Check the enemy king and attack another piece (not pawn) at the same time

title: Join the dark side
description: With at least 8 total friendly pieces and pawns left on the board, put them all on dark squares

title: Conga line
description: Stack 3 pawns on the same file

title: Endgame connoisseur
description: Win an end game with an even amount of pawns for each side and no pieces.

title: Close calls
description: Win a game with less than 10 seconds on the clock. (Remember to pause the clock if you resign.)

title: Det sjunde inseglet
description: Win a game as black, cosplaying as death.

title: Connected world
description: Play a game online

title: Connect 4
description: Create a pawn chain with 4 pawns

title: Egg
description: Open the game by pushing you e-pawn and then pushing your g-pawn twice.

title: I have to C to B-sharp
description: The brain has to wear a blindfold for the first 5 pieces they say (someone has to say what moves the hands have made).

title: Horsey moves weird
description: Move the same knight 4 times in a row

title: Confession booth
description: Place your bishop next to the enemy queen.

title: Mistur Worldurwidur
description: Only use icelandic piece names for an entire game.

title: Back to back
description: Play two games in the same week

title: Im going easy on you
description: The hand plays the entire game only using their left hand

title: In perfect sync
description: Play pair chess instead of hand and brain. You alternate who makes moves. No talking allowed. No 30 second rule.

title: Headless horseman
description: Enter the brainless stage with no bishops but both knights.

title: Bechdel test
description: Trade queen for queen.

title: Scalable portfolio
description: Promote to both bishop and queen in the same game.

title: Witness me
description: Take a pawn with a piece that can be recaptured by the king.

title: Classic blunders
description: Bring two beverages to the match. Your opponent has to pick one, and then you both drink.

title: Lemmings
description: The first time a pawn is moved, it has to take or jump two squares.

title: Castle late and never
description: Win a game where you don't castle

title: Kingmaker
description: Design your own king, give it a name and backstory and use it in a game.
